attributes.action: Sterilize anyone conficted of any crime that has involved children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When people are convicted of dong crime involving children - murder, assult, rape, cruelty, neglect etc should be sterilized. What may happen when these people get released, they will have another child(ren). There is a good chance that these people will repeat their actions on these new children. Plus anyone who is imprisoned for child related crime has lost the right to be parents.
